name: Chop Chop (efirtina)
description:
Theme: Delay the inevitable

How to play?

- Hold or press Space to perform dash.

- Creatures touched by your axe are damaged while you are dashing.

- Your character always turns around itself, performing dash causes to change character's turning direction.

- You can only move by dashing.

- Press R to restart level.

Objective:

- Kill the trees to delay the desturaction of the barrage.

- By killing them, collect wood to build a boat to survive the barrage's collapse.

Assets:

-https://www.dafont.com/blocktopia.font
